mapper.select:
SELECT aab201,aab301,aab202,aab203,aab204, aab205 FROM ab02
and aab301 LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{map.city}),'%')
and aab202 LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{map.name}),'%')
limit #{map.begin}, #{map.num}

SELECT count(*) FROM ab02
and aab301 LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{map.city}),'%')
and aab202 LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{map.name}),'%')
SELECT aab201,aab301,aab202,aab203,aab204, aab205 FROM ab02 where aab201=#{id}
